title: NodeStealer 2.0 Poses as ‘Microsoft’ to Hack Facebook and Browser Data
description:
By Deeba Ahmed

NodeStealer 2.0 is a variant of the NodeStealer infostealing malware, which was taken down by Meta in May 2023.
